game.name: Two Worlds II - Echoes of the Dark Past
game.categories: Multi-player, Online Co-op, Cross-Platform Multiplayer, Downloadable Content, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Steam Trading Cards, In-App Purchases, Steam Cloud, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Return to Antaloor in a brand-new, three-map multiplayer adventure that bridges the events of "Two Worlds II" and "Call of the Tenebrae"!
game.shortDescriptionEn: Return to Antaloor in a brand-new, three-map multiplayer adventure that bridges the events of "Two Worlds II" and "Call of the Tenebrae"!
